slides.heading: Your Computer Education
slides.description: Enhance your skills with our comprehensive computer training programs. Master courses like Typing Master, Tally GST, Graphic Designing, Excel, AutoCAD, and ADCA to build a successful career.

slides.heading: We Provide The Best
slides.description: Get professional computer education with experienced instructors and modern facilities. Our one-to-one ratio approach ensures personalized attention and practical learning.

slides.heading: Skill Development
slides.description: With 15 years of experience and 14,500+ trained students, we provide industry-standard computer skills that help advance your career in today's competitive world.

items.title: Typing Master
items.shortDescription: Master the art of fast and accurate typing with our comprehensive typing training program designed for all skill levels.
items.fullDescription: Our Typing Master course is designed to help you develop excellent typing skills with speed and accuracy. Whether you're a beginner or looking to improve your existing typing speed, our structured program covers touch typing techniques, proper finger placement, and practice exercises. Learn to type without looking at the keyboard, increase your words per minute (WPM), and reduce typing errors. Our expert instructors provide personalized guidance and regular assessments to track your progress.
benefits: Improve typing accuracy and reduce errors
Enhance productivity in work and studies
Build muscle memory for efficient typing
process: Learning proper finger placement and posture

items.title: Tally GST
items.shortDescription: Master Tally Prime with GST accounting and become proficient in managing business finances, inventory, and tax compliance.
items.fullDescription: Our Tally GST course provides comprehensive training on Tally Prime software with a focus on GST (Goods and Services Tax) accounting. Learn to create company profiles, manage ledgers, handle inventory, generate invoices, and file GST returns. This course covers all aspects of accounting including financial statements, balance sheets, profit & loss accounts, and tax calculations. Perfect for accounting professionals, business owners, and students looking to build a career in accounting.
benefits: Stay updated with latest tax regulations
process: Financial reporting and GST return filing

items.title: Graphic Designing Training
items.shortDescription: Learn professional graphic design skills using industry-standard tools like Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and CorelDRAW to create stunning visual designs.
items.fullDescription: Our Graphic Designing Training course equips you with the skills needed to create professional visual designs for print and digital media. Learn to use Adobe Photoshop for image editing and manipulation, Adobe Illustrator for vector graphics and logos, and CorelDRAW for layout design. The course covers design principles, color theory, typography, logo design, brochure creation, social media graphics, and web design elements. Perfect for aspiring graphic designers, marketing professionals, and creative enthusiasts.
benefits: Work as a freelance graphic designer
process: Introduction to design principles and tools

items.title: Excel Training
items.shortDescription: Master Microsoft Excel from basics to advanced level, including formulas, functions, data analysis, pivot tables, and automation.
items.fullDescription: Our Excel Training course covers everything from basic spreadsheet operations to advanced data analysis and automation. Learn essential Excel functions, formulas, data validation, conditional formatting, charts, pivot tables, and macros. The course includes practical exercises on data management, financial calculations, reporting, and dashboard creation. Perfect for office professionals, data analysts, accountants, and anyone who works with spreadsheets regularly.
benefits: Enhance career prospects in data-driven roles
process: Mastering pivot tables and data analysis

items.title: AutoCAD Training
items.shortDescription: Learn professional CAD (Computer-Aided Design) skills using AutoCAD for architectural, engineering, and technical drawing projects.
items.fullDescription: Our AutoCAD Training course provides comprehensive training on AutoCAD software, the industry-standard tool for 2D and 3D computer-aided design. Learn to create precise technical drawings, architectural plans, engineering designs, and 3D models. The course covers drawing tools, dimensioning, layers, blocks, layouts, 3D modeling, and rendering. Perfect for architects, engineers, drafters, interior designers, and students pursuing careers in design and engineering.
benefits: Work in architecture and engineering firms
Meet industry standards for CAD work
Build a portfolio of design projects

items.title: ADCA Training
items.shortDescription: Complete Advanced Diploma in Computer Applications (ADCA) program covering all essential computer skills and software applications.
items.fullDescription: Our ADCA (Advanced Diploma in Computer Applications) course is a comprehensive program that covers fundamental to advanced computer skills. The curriculum includes computer basics, operating systems, Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint), internet and email, basic programming concepts, database management, web design basics, and computer networking fundamentals. This course is ideal for students, job seekers, and professionals looking to enhance their computer literacy and gain a recognized diploma in computer applications.
benefits: Improve job prospects in various industries
Prepare for higher education in IT
process: Basic programming and web design concepts

items.title: CSC Center
items.shortDescription: Common Service Center providing government and private services to citizens in a convenient and accessible manner.
items.fullDescription: Our CSC (Common Service Center) provides a wide range of government and private services to citizens, making essential services easily accessible. We offer services including Aadhaar enrollment and updates, PAN card applications, voter ID services, utility bill payments, insurance services, banking services, and various government scheme registrations. Our trained staff ensures smooth and efficient service delivery with proper documentation and support.
features: PAN card and voter ID services

items.title: Computer Coaching Center
items.shortDescription: Comprehensive computer coaching programs for students of all ages, from basic computer literacy to advanced programming.
items.fullDescription: Our Computer Coaching Center offers structured computer education programs designed for students, professionals, and individuals looking to enhance their computer skills. We provide courses covering computer fundamentals, programming languages, software applications, web development, and IT certifications. Our experienced instructors use a combination of theoretical knowledge and hands-on practice to ensure effective learning. We offer flexible schedules including weekend batches and evening classes to accommodate working professionals and students.

items.title: Computer Hardware Repair
items.shortDescription: Learn computer hardware maintenance, troubleshooting, and repair skills for a career in IT support and hardware services.
items.fullDescription: Our Computer Hardware Repair course provides comprehensive training in computer hardware components, assembly, maintenance, and troubleshooting. Learn to identify and fix hardware issues, assemble and disassemble computers, install operating systems, and diagnose various hardware problems. The course covers motherboard, processor, RAM, storage devices, power supply, cooling systems, peripherals, and networking hardware. You'll gain hands-on experience in hardware repair, component replacement, BIOS configuration, and system optimization. Perfect for those seeking careers in IT support, computer repair shops, or hardware maintenance roles.
benefits: Improve job opportunities in IT support

items.title: Data Entry
items.shortDescription: Master data entry skills including typing speed, accuracy, and working with various data formats for efficient data management.
items.fullDescription: Our Data Entry course provides comprehensive training in data entry operations, typing techniques, and data management. Learn to enter data accurately and efficiently using keyboard shortcuts, improve typing speed and accuracy, and work with various data formats including spreadsheets, databases, and forms. The course covers data entry fundamentals, keyboard proficiency, accuracy improvement techniques, data validation, formatting, and working with different software applications. You'll gain practical experience in handling large volumes of data, maintaining accuracy standards, and meeting productivity targets. Perfect for those seeking careers in data entry, administrative roles, or data management positions.
benefits: Increase job opportunities in administrative roles
Work efficiently with large data volumes

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.termsContent1: Welcome to Maan Cyber World & Computer Institute. By accessing and using our website and services, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. Please read them carefully before using our services. Our computer training programs, including Typing Master, Tally GST, Graphic Designing, Excel Training, AutoCAD Training, and ADCA courses, are designed to provide quality education and skill development.
terms.termsContent2: All course materials, curriculum, and training content provided by our institute are protected by copyright and intellectual property laws. Students are granted access to course materials for personal educational use only. Unauthorized distribution, reproduction, or commercial use of our training materials is strictly prohibited. We reserve the right to modify course content, schedules, and fees at any time with prior notice to enrolled students.
terms.securityContent1: At Maan Cyber World & Computer Institute, we take data security and privacy seriously. We are committed to protecting the personal information of our students, staff, and website visitors. All student records, enrollment information, and personal data are stored securely and handled in accordance with applicable data protection regulations.
terms.securityContent2: We implement industry-standard security measures to safeguard your information, including secure data encryption, access controls, and regular security audits. Your personal information is used solely for educational and administrative purposes, such as course enrollment, progress tracking, and communication regarding our services. We do not sell, trade, or share your personal information with third parties without your explicit consent.
terms.securityContent3: If you have any concerns about data security or wish to access, modify, or delete your personal information, please contact us through our official channels. We are dedicated to maintaining transparency and ensuring the highest standards of data protection for all members of our educational community.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introductionContent1: Welcome to Maan Cyber World & Computer Institute's Privacy Policy. This document outlines how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information when you interact with our website, enroll in our courses, or use our services. By accessing our website or using our services, you agree to the terms outlined in this privacy policy.
privacy.introductionContent2: We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal data. This policy applies to all information collected through our website, enrollment forms, course registrations, and any other interactions with our institute. We collect information such as your name, contact details, email address, phone number, course preferences, and payment information to provide you with quality educational services and maintain accurate student records.
privacy.introductionContent3: Your personal information is used solely for educational and administrative purposes, including course enrollment, progress tracking, communication regarding courses and services, sending important updates, and processing payments. We do not share, sell, or rent your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes. We may share information only when required by law or with your explicit consent.
privacy.paymentContent1: At Maan Cyber World & Computer Institute, we accept various secure payment methods to make course enrollment convenient for our students. We accept cash payments at our institute location, bank transfers, online payment gateways, and digital payment methods such as UPI, credit cards, and debit cards. All payment transactions are processed through secure and encrypted channels to ensure the safety of your financial information.
privacy.paymentContent2: For course fees and other charges, we provide detailed invoices and receipts for all transactions. Payment confirmation is sent via email or SMS to the contact information provided during enrollment. We maintain strict confidentiality regarding payment information and do not store complete credit card or bank account details on our servers. All financial data is handled in compliance with applicable financial regulations and data protection laws.
privacy.paymentContent3: If you have any questions about payment methods, refund policies, or need assistance with payment processing, please contact our administrative office. We are committed to providing transparent and secure payment options for all our students and ensuring a smooth enrollment experience.

about.title: About Us
about.whoWeAreDesc: SINT Education stands as pioneers in progressive learning, redefining computer education standards worldwide. Led by visionary Director Sudhir Sharma, we are dedicated to shaping future software professionals.
about.whatWeDoDesc1: We are committed to providing high-quality, affordable computer education through an innovative one-to-one ratio approach, ensuring personalized attention and access to cutting-edge technology in well-equipped labs.
about.whatWeDoDesc2: Our curriculum seamlessly integrates theoretical knowledge with practical application, facilitated by live demonstrations on Pentium computers. Our mission is to cultivate top-tier software professionals ready for global challenges.
about.whyChooseUsDesc: Choosing SINT Education means selecting a pathway to excellence. We are committed to quality, high-caliber computer education, and meeting multinational organization standards.

features.title: Theory to Practical
features.description: We bridge the gap between theory and practical application seamlessly.

features.title: Expert Faculty
features.description: 15 Years of Teaching Experience (14,500+ Students Trained).

features.title: Low Fee Structure
features.description: Minimal costs or charges for accessing a particular service or program.
